page.title: 10THE AVERAGE PRICE OF FOOD
page.content: Our class did Economics for our project. One of the things we had to find out was the average cost of the class' breakfast and lunch. The costs are below in the charts. Breakfast Lunch {Â£ p Â£ p {TEA BAGS }1.38 {SCHOOL DINNER }.65 {MILK }.22{- PACKED LUNCH - {CEREAL} .80 {CRISPS} .11 {TOAST/BREAD} .46{ FRUIT} .09 {BUTTER/MARGE}.46 {CHOCOLATE BIS} .07 {MARMALADE} .42 {DRINK} .18 {SUGAR} .52 {2 FILLED ROLLS }.22 TOTAL COST 4.84 {YOGURT } .18 {LUNCH BOX} 2.49 TOTAL COST 3.34 We found out what the people in our class ate for breakfast and lunch. Then we got their prices from different shops and found the a6erage price for each item and made our chart
